ygData.messageBody:
Correct, but you only get a single attack of your primary weapon, you do not get a chance for a dual or double attack on a reposte....to my knowledge. So I can see getting to a point where 2h slash may surpass 1h slash, even against red mobs, because you may be able to get several reposte hits in one round.

>>> David Rogers <derogers334@...> 5.24.99 3:42:07 PM >>>
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>

--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> Reposte is a counter attack. When you reposte you
> get an extra swing with your primary weapon. You
> can reposte multiple times per round. And I'm
> learning that reposte is damn cool when weilding a
> 2h that hits for up to 44 :)

So everytime you pass your riposte check successfully, you get another
attack *on top* of all your normal and double attack and dual weild
attacks?
